subject: Hockey, Ice
Accidents and Safety
Concussions
lead_paragraph: New rules installed after the 2004-5 lockout have sped up the game and made it more crowd pleasing, but they have also led to more high-speed collisions.
snippet: New rules installed after the 2004-5 lockout have sped up the game and made it more crowd pleasing, but they have also led to more high-speed collisions.
